description: Next in the 0.95 "Development" Series of releases.  Serves as a "rough cut" preview of what is coming in 0.96.0.  Not for production.

issues.title: [EC2] support mapreduce subsystem
[EC2] mapreduce fixups for PE
[rest] SPNEGO-based authentication
HFileDataBlockEncoderImpl uses wrong header size when reading HFiles with no checksums (0.96)
Fix and reenable TestLogRolling.testLogRollOnPipelineRestart
TestImportExport has been failing against hadoop 0.23/2.0 profile
Verify protobuf serialization is correctly chunking upon read to avoid direct memory OOMs
Convert WAL to pb
TestMiniClusterLoadSequential fails in trunk build on hadoop 2
TestJoinedScanners fails in trunk build on hadoop 2.0
Add metrics for snapshots
TestDistributedLogSplitting#testThreeRSAbort fails against hadoop 2.0
Allow a deferred sync option per Mutation.
Implementation of the log splitting without creating intermediate files
Create a new "replay" command so that recovered edits won't mess up normal coprocessing & metrics
Add new metrics to better monitor recovery process
Do the necessary plumbing for the region locations in META table and send the info to the RegionServers
Make use of the plumbing in HBASE-7932 to provide location hints when region files are created
Export$Exporter could be replaced with IdentityTableMapper
Make Store flush algorithm pluggable
JoinedHeap for non essential column families should reseek instead of seek
TestHFileOutputFormat.testMRIncremental* fails against hadoop2 profile
TestTableInputFormatScan#testScanFromConfiguration fails on hadoop2 profile

TestMetricsWALSourceImpl from hbase-hadoop2-compat module missing Apache license.
[hadoop2] Several tests break because of HDFS-4305

Create a new IntegrationTestBigLinkedListWithChaosMonkey
Do not log full classnames in logs, just the last two levels
Change ServerName so it uses hostname  only, not FQDN hostnames
Miscellaneous log fixups for hbase-it; tidier logging, fix a few NPEs
mapreduce input and output formats to go against hbase
merge tool expects regions all have different sequence ids
Result.row is cached in getRow; this breaks MapReduce
TableInputFormat does not setup the configuration for HBase mapreduce jobs correctly
Handling read failures during recovery‏ - when HMaster calls Namenode recovery, recovery may be a failure leading to read failure while splitting logs
If HRegionPartitioner is used in MapReduce, client side configurations are overwritten by hbase-site.xml.
Building against Hadoop 0.23 uses out-of-date MapReduce artifacts

[hbck] Catch and handle NotServingRegionException when close region attempt fails
Thrift Filter Language documentation is inconsistent
MapReduce based tests broken on Hadoop 2.0.0-alpha
Proper warning message when opening a log file with no entries (idle cluster)
Thrift's deleteMultiple() raises exception instead of returning list of failed deletes
Move TestHBase7051.java into TestAtomicOperation.java
KV size metric went missing from StoreScanner.
[replication] When transferring queues, check if the peer still exists before copying the znodes
Remove warning message about running 'hbase migrate'
grant with an empty string as permission should throw an exception
Family Dir is not removed using modifyTable()
Suggested JDWP debug options in hbase-env.sh are wrong
HBase regionserver never stops when running `hbase-daemon.sh stop regionserver`
Include the guava classes as a dependency for jobs using mapreduce.TableMapReduceUtil
HBase can be stuck when closing regions concurrently
TestHFileBlock.testGzipCompression should ignore the block checksum
[replication] NPE while replicating a log that is acquiring a new block from HDFS
Optimize StochasticLoadBalancer
avoid assign for disabling table regions(OPENING/PENDING_OPEN) in SSH
Backport HBASE-8140 "TableMapReduceUtils#addDependencyJar fails when nested inside another MR job"
TestMasterFailover#testMasterFailoverWithMockedRITOnDeadRS may fail due to regions randomly assigned to a RS
JSON formatting for cluster status is sort of broken
Avoid unnecessary row compare in StoreScanner
Logic errror causes infinite loop in HRegion.bulkLoadHFiles(List)
Don't use hdfs append during lease recovery
In some situations data is not replicated to slaves when deferredLogSync is enabled
Remove proxy and engine, rely directly on pb generated Service
Replication code logs like crazy if a target table cannot be found.
Possible NPE on regionserver abort if replication service has not been started
delete tests in table_tests.rb(TestShell) always running on empty table.
ChaosMonkey action for root is irrelevant
Fix the bad dependency on netty from HDFS

Regions by Region Server table in Master's table view needs styling
Add lz4 to test compression util usage string
Master LogSplitting metrics update wrong counters
Master cannot start if TableNotFoundException is thrown while partial table recovery
Add some resources checker for tests
Performance Evaluation does not consider the args passed in case of more than one client
User triggered flushes does not allow compaction to get triggered even if compaction criteria is met
HBaseClient never recovers for single HTable.get() calls with no retries when regions move
TestThreads#testSleepWithoutInterrupt should not expect a bounded wait time

ExploringCompactionPolicy can get stuck in rare cases.

mapreduce.TestTableInputFormatScan times out frequently
Consolidate class loaders
Enable essential column family support by default

Prefetching .META. rows in case only when useCache is set to true

balancerSwitch making two zookeeper calls everytime.

Fix rat check and rat warning in trunk
Remove Async HBase from 0.95 and trunk.

Master won't go down.  Stuck waiting on .META. to come on line.

Opening a region failed on "Metrics source RegionServer,sub=Regions already exists!"

Tighten up IntegrationTestsDriver filter

Fix missing headers
Clean up tmp coprocessor jars

There's an orig file in 0.95

improve 'patch submission' section in HBase book
